column2: developer=Bill and Meg<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mahjongg.html Lord of the Rings] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 5 January 2011)</ref>
}}'''''Lord of the Rings''''' is a video game version of [[wikipedia:Mahjong
column3: mahjong]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> In this game all chinese symbols are replaced with [[Angerthas
column4: runes]], places, objects and characters from [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
